name: Fairy Tail - Rochka
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can have your opponent gain 500 LP, then they look at the top 3 cards of your Deck and choose 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest into the Deck. Before damage calculation, if this card battles: You can send this card to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Fairy Tail - Rochka" once per turn.
